author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Tetris® 99 51st MAXIMUS CUP event runs from 11 p.m. PT on January 8 to 10:59 p.m. PT on January 12. To participate, you’ll need to be a Nintendo Switch Online member* and play the Tetris 99 online mode during the event period. You’ll earn event points based on your placement in each match. Once you’ve accumulated a total of 100 event points, a new theme will unlock, featuring art, music and Tetrimino designs inspired by the updated content in the Animal Crossing: New Horizons game!

*Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. This game includes an in-game purchase option for users who do not have a membership. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Tetris ® & © 1985~2026 Tetris Holding. Tetris logos, Tetris theme song and Tetriminos are trademarks of Tetris
title: Tetris® 99 – 51st MAXIMUS CUP Gameplay Trailer - Nintendo Switch
